# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/customizable_localization/godherja/GH_achievement_custom_loc.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

### Custom loc linked to scripted gui to keep track of completed achievements across games ###


GH_achiev_ataleoftwocities = {
	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_tutorial_lesson_completed = reactive_advice_achiev_ataleoftwocities
			NOT = { has_global_variable = gh_achiev_ataleoftwocities }
		}
		localization_key = achiev_ataleoftwocities
	}
	text = { localization_key = NONE }
}

	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_tutorial_lesson_completed = reactive_advice_achiev_thefridgeorderlastdaysofaversaria
			NOT = { has_global_variable = gh_achiev_thefridgeorderlastdaysofaversaria }
		}
		localization_key = achiev_thefridgeorderlastdaysofaversaria
	}
	text = { localization_key = NONE }
}
GH_achiev_forgeofthelegions = {
	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_tutorial_lesson_completed = reactive_advice_achiev_forgeofthelegions
			NOT = { has_global_variable = gh_achiev_forgeofthelegions }
		}
		localization_key = achiev_forgeofthelegions
	}
	text = { localization_key = NONE }
}

	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_tutorial_lesson_completed = reactive_advice_achiev_aneventrueraautokratia
			NOT = { has_global_variable = gh_achiev_aneventrueraautokratia }
		}
		localization_key = achiev_aneventrueraautokratia
	}
	text = { localization_key = NONE }
}

	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_tutorial_lesson_completed = reactive_advice_achiev_withthesedarkarts
			NOT = { has_global_variable = gh_achiev_withthesedarkarts }
		}
		localization_key = achiev_withthesedarkarts
